tool_description: This API provide for the given website domain name the list of the technologies used in the websites, the website IP Address, the server location, the global rank , the linked domains and the main language used
name: SItes X Ray
title: SItes X Ray

api_list.name: /{website-domain-name}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meparis-sites-x-ray-v1.p.rapidapi.com/toto.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meparis-sites-x-ray-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://meparis-sites-x-ray-v1.p.rapidapi.com/{website_domain_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meparis-sites-x-ray-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
